column4: I have 8.04 working fine on this system .. is there a real compelling need to update it to 8.10?
no, 8.04 is an LTS release, you can as well use it for some time. if you want "newer" apps, it's however not bad to upgrade
there are no big changes.. you could as well try the live cd and decide later
thanks .... ya ... I'll probably sit tight for a while ... this is working sweet
